definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Please check back periodically for congresses we will cover.
sentences.chinese: 我们将奉上会议现场报道，请定期回来查看。

sentences.english: Reporters wishing to attend the conference in-person must have a valid press credential for access.
sentences.chinese: 想要到现场报道的记者必须有一个有效记者证来进场。

sentences.english: This event will be covered live by TV.
sentences.chinese: 此事将由电视作现场报道。

sentences.english: Show some students' report to class and check them.
sentences.chinese: 让学生通过由易到难的现场报道。

sentences.english: Satellites have extended the power of communications to report events at the instant of occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 人造卫星拓展了通讯能力，可以对事件进行现场报道。

definition: live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to direct a television or radio broadcast/director (TV, radio)
evening newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Evening News
